Title: Extracting Answers
Description:
Kypari Ik is just one of many locations that houses some of Empress Shek'zeer's offspring. In their juvenile state the young are reckless and difficult to control. They are also deadly.

Swarmborn are hatched with a highly toxic venom that diminishes in potency with age. The venom can incapacitate even the strongest and most skilled fighter if it hits flesh.

I would like you to bring me some of this venom.
ObjectivesText: Collect 6 Venom-Coated Mandibles from the Ik'thik Swarmborn in Kypari Ik.
CompletionText: Swarmborn venom will not only give us an additional weapon, it will also help us figure out what stage the swarm is in.
RewardText:
This venom is in its advanced stages, but doesn't seem to be losing it's potency...

This is very curious. The Klaxxi will want to know immediately. Thank you, Wakener.
